function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Suspension of resort operations leading to under-occupancy and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among employees and visitors.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, regular disinfection, and social distancing measures to reduce the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Use of disinfection technology, contactless check-in, and digital health screening tools.","People":"Employees, visitors, and local community.","Owner":"Resort management and local health authorities."},{"Description":"Temporary resort closure leading to financial strain on employees and potential economic impact on the local community.","Impact":"Financial hardship for employees, reduced income for local businesses, and economic downturn in the local community.","Mitigation":"Provide financial support to employees, promote local business partnerships, and engage in community support initiatives.","Technologies":"Digital financial assistance tools, remote work platforms, and online community engagement platforms.","People":"Employees, local businesses, and the wider community.","Owner":"Resort management, local government, and business associations."},{"Description":"Lack of clear communication and guidance leading to anxiety and stress among employees.","Impact":"Decreased morale, productivity, and mental well-being of employees.","Mitigation":"Regular and transparent communication, mental health support programs, and structured crisis management training.","Technologies":"Remote communication tools, mental health apps, and online training platforms.","People":"Employees, leadership team, and HR department.","Owner":"Resort management and HR department."}]}
